src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LP : Where is room 17 ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . [MASK] [MASK] RC : How do I get to room 17 ? Do I have to take the lift ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LP : How long before my appointment ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] [MASK] RC : I do n't think ARI heard because you spoke at the same time as him . src: ARI : Hello , I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : Well , um , we 'd like to go to room 17 for an appointment . Where is ... Because it looks like he 's stuck here . RC : Oh , I think so . Room 17 ... [MASK] LP : How could we ask him ? RC : It is room 17 that you 're showing us to ? ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : So everything 's fine , we can go . We have an appointment in 5 minutes , do we have time to go there ? ARI : Yes , of course . [MASK] LP : Yes , my friend has forgotten his appointment time . He ca n't remember the doctor 's name either , can you help us please ? Will he ever move ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm going to call a nurse to come and inform you . Do you have any other questions ? [MASK] [end] RC : We 'll wait for the nurse . ARI : Yes . # acknowledge ( ) ARI : Thank you , goodbye . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) RC : Goodbye . # bye ( )

[MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Thank you . src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] RC : Hello ARI . [MASK] LP : I need to go to room 17 for treatment . So , I do n't know how to get to room 17 . [MASK] [MASK] RC : ARI , could you please tell us how to get to room 17 ? For a ... [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes . You continue along the building , take the lift and it 's on the second floor . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Ok. And is it on the left or the right ... on the second floor ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . [MASK] RC : Ok . The reception is on the ground floor , is that right ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes . Absolutely . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Are we , are we expected in room 17 ? Is there someone who will see us or guide us ? RC : Yes , do you know if there is someone who will come and welcome us to room 17 ? And what paperwork do we need to provide ? ARI : I 'll call a nurse to find out . Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] RC : Ok , thank you , I 'll wait for you to call the nurse then . [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] RC : Can I sit somewhere with my husband while I wait ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes . Of course . [MASK] [MASK] LP : I have an appointment at 12.30 PM , is it going ahead ? I 'm not late or too early ? RC : Um , we have ... [MASK] [end] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . # cant-help ( ) RC : I 'm the one you have to talk to because if not ... LP : I have an appointment at 12.30 PM . Will there be any delay ? RC : Um hello , we would like to know if there is a delay to welcome us to room 17 , we have an appointment in room 17 . ARI : No . # disaffirm ( ) RC : Because we have another appointment later in another department . ARI : Yes . Of course . # affirm ( ) LP : Do you know what type of appointment I have , is it an anaesthetist , a surgeon , who 'll inform me or something else or an examination ? RC : I did n't quite understand . # r-paraph ( ) LP : Um , I have an appointment , is it , is it a treatment this time , is it a surgeon , an anaesthetist or a radiologist who 'll take ... # p-paraph ( ) RC : Hello , are you able to tell me who is going to see us ? Is it an an anaesthetist , the surgeon , a nurse ? For this ... for this operation . ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . # cant-help ( ) ; suggest ( going-to ( reception ) ) RC : Ok , thank you . # acknowledge ( ) ; thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . See you soon . Have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

src: LC : Hello . # greet ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : We 're looking for a way to get to room 17 , are n't we ? # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) RP : Yes . # affirm ( ) RP : Yes , we need to go to room 17 for treatment . # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) [start] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] LC : Do you , do you know what time our appointment is ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Do you need the name ? ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] LC : Thank you ARI , have a nice day . [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] [end] ARI : Thank you , see you around , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )
